the Essentials / Name Tags & Name Plates                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              Name Tags and Name Plates   The Office of Student Engagement orders name tags and plates on a rolling basis for all MBA students. Name tags are used at Stern events including recruiting, student organizations, and other social or professional events. Name plates are used in classrooms.    If you have lost the name plate and/or tag issued to you at Launch or Langone Lab, you may purchase a replacement online. The cost is $11.00 for name plates and $8.00 for name tags. We are not able to place orders on a student's behalf due to the necessary online payment. If you have a Stern email address, please use the following instructions to order:    Step 1: Sign into campus groups    Step 2: Stay logged into campus groups, and then click here    Step 3: Follow the ordering directions. Once we have confirmation of your payment, we will process your request and email you when your replacement is ready for pick up in the Office of Student Engagement. Please allow at least 2-3 weeks for delivery.                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              Name Tags and Name Plates   The Office of Student Engagement orders name tags and plates on a rolling basis for all MBA students. Name tags are used at Stern events including recruiting, student organizations, and other social or professional events. Name plates are used in classrooms.    If you have lost the name plate and/or tag issued to you at Launch or Langone Lab, you may purchase a replacement online. The cost is $11.00 for name plates and $8.00 for name tags. We are not able to place orders on a student's behalf due to the necessary online payment. If you have a Stern email address, please use the following instructions to order:    Step 1: Sign into campus groups    Step 2: Stay logged into campus groups, and then click here    Step 3: Follow the ordering directions. Once we have confirmation of your payment, we will process your request and email you when your replacement is ready for pick up in the Office of Student Engagement. Please allow at least 2-3 weeks for delivery. Partners / Student Activities / Services & Forms / Order Nametags / Plates                              Share / Print                   Print       Email       Share       Like                                                                                               Order Nametags / Plates       Office of Student Engagement orders name tags & plates on a rolling basis for all MBA students. If you have lost the name plate and/or tag that was issued to you at Pre-Term, you can order a new plate/tag by completing the request form and paying for your plate/tag. Once we have confirmation of your payment, we will process your request and email you when your replacement is ready for pick up in KMC 6-120. The cost is $10.00 for name plates and $8.00 for name tags. Please allow at least 2-3 weeks for delivery. Name plates are used in classrooms. Name tags are used at Stern events including recruiting, club and other social/professional events. Click here to order your new name plate/tag .
